```{r}
library(sf)
library(ggplot2) #development version!
library(tidyverse)

```

```{r}
NR_Building <- read_sf("alldata/untitled")

#Work out how to select correct layer
#NR_Building2 <- read_sf("alldata/data" Name = )
#Limit plot to just Arran
#Save images

#ggsave("plot.png", width = 5, height = 5)
#Saves last plot as 5’ x 5’ file named "plot.png" in
#working directory. Matches file type to file extension.

NR_Foreshore <- read_sf("alldata/untitled4")
```

```{r}
NR_Building %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_sf(aes(fill = FEATCODE)) +
  theme(legend.position="none")
```

```{r}
NR_Foreshore %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_sf(aes(fill = FEATCODE)) +
  theme(legend.position="none")
```

```{r}
ggplot() +
  geom_sf(data = NR_Building, aes(fill = FEATCODE)) +
  geom_sf(data = NR_Foreshore, aes(fill = FEATCODE)) +
  theme(legend.position="none")
```
